lender.occupational_info:
Hope for HIV/AIDS recognizes that the battle against HIV/AIDS, Malaria and Poverty can be won at the community level where the issues practices hold sway. To this effect, the organization creates a platform for linking various communities in fighting these scourges through the following strategies:
o H.E.L.P- HIV/AIDS Enlightenment and Life Program, is our educative channel that we use to create adequate awareness an HIV via workshops, Seminars and talks at varying levels. o HOME-BASED CARE- This is holistic home visit activities in which we reachout to the poor identify and establish relationship with them. o o HOPE CORPS: Volunteer who provides Home-based Care to PLWHA.

lender.name: Kato
lender.occupational_info: I was diagnosed with feline hyperthyroidism in late September 2011. Taking pills twice a day was no fun (for me or my owner) which is why we had to find an alternative treatment. I was sent to a clinic for Radioiodine I-131 Therapy in mid-October and will find out in January if I have been cured. UPDATE: My blood and urine tests from mid-January 2012 show that I no longer have hyperthyroidism. YEAH!!

lender.occupational_info: I do everything I can to insure the health of the Great Lakes ecosystem for generations to come. There is an amazing amount of water in our region, and water is necessary for life. I educate people about the Great Lakes and try to instill a sense that we as a global community need to recognize that actively or passively, we are currently making important choices about the future of water as a resource on our planet. I push for active, educated decision making.

lender.name: Serik
lender.loan_because: I am promoting a new amateur soccer club, Almaty United Football Club (www.clubwebsite.co.uk/almatyunitedfootballclub , www.yourfootballclub.org) You can become one of the owners of the Almaty United Football Club, Kazakstan (UEFA member since 2002), just for £1! You will be able to vote on strategic issues, check financial statement of the club, your name (or nickname) will be listed in Club's Owner List. You will get a discount on club items and you will have the priority rights in club issues. This year Almaty United starts in Division Two, Almaty City B-League. Champion of City B-League is promoted to Almaty City A-League - this is current objective of "Almaty United". Winner of Almaty City A-League plays in Division Two play-offs and two finalist teams get promotion to Division One. Teams of Division One are allowed to play in Kazakstan Cup so in three years from now Almaty United could reach UEFA Cup if we win Kazakstan Cup! And finally, two top teams of Division One are promoted to Kazakstani Premiership. Winner of Premiership participates in Champions League (usually in 1st qualification round). Thus, our long-term goal (5 years) is to play in Champions League! Where in Europe you can find a club with such a great opportunity and relatively low cost? Annual budget of Division Two club is $2,000-5,000! In Division One it increases significantly because it is proffesional division - $100, 000 - $300,000. Almaty United is not the first club to be owned and managed by own supporters. For the football management simulators fans it is brilliant opportunity to start with probably lowest league european club - for those fans who loves to challenge hardest tasks and succeed! Check these links for more info: Become an Owner of AUFC: http://www.yourfootballclub.org/www/becomeanowner.htm AUFC managers: http://www.yourfootballclub.org/www/teammanagers/teammanagers.htm AUFC Owners: http://www.yourfootballclub.org/www/clubowners.htm About Kazakstan: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kazakhstan Read the contract: http://www.yourfootballclub.org/www/aufcprivatecontract.htm
lender.occupational_info: I am a playing coach and manager of AUFC. My work is to promote AUFC in the world, attract investors, and achieve reasonable results.
